images.description: White background with a green outline of a house, featuring a roof, chimney, two windows, and a partially open door.
images.suggested_usage: Use as the primary company logo in the header and footer.

images.description: A renovated two-story house with a white lower facade and a dark brown upper facade and roof, nestled in a forested, mountainous area. A person is visible near the side of the house.
images.suggested_usage: Use in the gallery or services section to showcase completed projects, specifically residential renovations.

images.description: A modern, newly renovated house with a cream-colored facade and a dark grey pitched tile roof, situated on a street with parked cars. A small gated fence is visible in front.
images.suggested_usage: Use in the gallery or services section to display examples of residential new builds or major roof/facade renovations.
